methods.name: CancelRecording
methods.doc: Cancel recording if there is a recorder currently active

methods.name: GetActiveRecorder
methods.doc: Retrieve the currently active recorder, or None if there none are active

methods.name: GetDefaultParameters
methods.doc: Get the default recorder parameters according to the project and user settings

methods.name: GetTakeRecorderPanel
methods.doc: Get the currently open take recorder panel, if one is open

methods.name: IsRecording
methods.doc: Check whether a recording is currently active

methods.name: IsTakeRecorderEnabled
methods.doc: Is the Take Recorder enabled in the build

methods.name: OpenTakeRecorderPanel
methods.doc: Get the currently open take recorder panel, if one is open, opening a new one if not

methods.name: SetOnTakeRecorderPanelChanged
methods.doc: Called when a Take Panel is constructed or destroyed.

methods.name: StartRecording
StopRecording
methods.doc: Stop recording if there is a recorder currently active
